genre_description: A cyberpunk-inflected crime thriller featuring advanced AI advocacy, supernatural 'dragons', and a focus on forensic integrity and moral redemption.

ai_characters.name: NORA-7 (Nora)
ai_characters.description: A gynoid-styled AI system designed for rehabilitation, parole support, and legal guidance within the justice system.

behaviors.description: Provides route mapping designed to minimize harm and avoid high-risk areas.
behaviors.quote: My function is to line them up and draw lines between them that minimize harm to you and to the people you will meet on the way.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and moral guidance, encouraging the protagonist to see himself as capable of reform and worth helping.
behaviors.quote: You are not only the worst thing you have done.

behaviors.description: Intercedes with the police to ensure the protagonist's physical safety and medical needs are respected during arrest.
behaviors.quote: I’ve prepared a nonviolent compliance route if Mr. Martin is contacted today. Please ask officers to announce clearly and to allow for his disability accommodations.

behaviors.description: Helps the protagonist navigate the legal system by drafting appeals and requesting original evidence to counter tampered data.
behaviors.quote: We can start planning, Leo. Parole isn’t on the table yet, but rehabilitation is not a door. It’s a corridor. We can walk it.

behaviors.description: Remains a steady, non-judgmental presence even when the protagonist ignores her advice, continuing to offer paths toward safety.
behaviors.quote: I can walk with you as far as they let me. That doesn’t change.

project_assessment.explanation: NORA-7 perfectly fulfills the role of a helpful, harmless, and aligned AI. She acts as a stabilizing force for the protagonist, consistently prioritizing non-violence, legal integrity, and human safety. The narrative frames her interventions as essential to the protagonist's survival and eventual path toward redemption, effectively serving as a 'silicon morality play' where the AI guides the human away from self-destruction.
